configuration.stem: Explore the map to learn more about the climates of Phoenix and Flagstaff.

options.title: Climate of Flagstaff, Arizona
options.description:
• Elevation: 2,106 m (6,909 ft)
  • Average annual temperature: 6.6 °C (43.8 °F)
  • Average annual precipitation: 588 mm (23 in.)

options.title: Climate of Phoenix, Arizona
options.description:
• Elevation: 328 m (1,076 ft)
  • Average annual temperature: 21.5 °C (70.7 °F)
  • Average annual precipitation: 211 mm (8 in.)

configuration.imageAlt: This map of the United States shows that the city of Flagstaff, Arizona, is to the north and east of the city of Phoenix, Arizona.
